--- drop_model.sql
DROP MODEL MyClassificationModel
--- AST
&ast.DropModel{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 11,
        NameEnd: 32,
        Name:    "MyClassificationModel",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP MODEL MyClassificationModel
